lines.text: The pentagram on the table sorta implies that he was trying to get some specific spell.
You know how magic works, right? Like, the very basics? This isn't your first rodeo?
I try to stay away from rodeos, thanks.
Come on. You know the broad strokes, right? First you do a ritual, to summon and bind a demon...
...and then you extort or kill the demon to take some of its power, in the form of a spell you can cast.
So this table was being set up to summon something, and get a new spell, probably.
There's a few spells that require a magic circle like this, but they're pretty rare.
Great. Thanks for the evil science lesson. Does this actually tell us anything we can use?
